titles.title: Federal Energy Monitoring, Commissioning, and Savings Act of 1997
To monitor and analyze energy use, and conduct continuous commissioning in Federal buildings to optimize building energy system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/13/1997--Introduced. Federal Energy Monitoring, Commissioning, and Savings Act of 1997 - Authorizes the Secretary of Energy to award extramural funds to monitor and analyze energy use, and to conduct continuous commissioning in Federal buildings to optimize building energy systems. Authorizes appropriations.
